overview.en: Lunox is an online shopping center that uses blockchain technology. Lunox will provide all the items needed in daily life, all transactions between sellers and buyers will use digital currencies including lunox tokens, our system will also provide a wallet to exchange digital currencies to Lunox Tokens, respectively. each member can make deposits or withdrawals in the form of other digital currencies such as BTC, ETH, XRP, and LTC. This business aims to introduce the public to the blockchain payment system which will make it easier for them to do business. In addition, Lunox will present the Lunox Exchange (LeX) digital currency exchange market, and make Lunox Token a market digital asset, of course that will make Lunox grow and stabilize on the market.
overview.zh: Lunox是一个使用区块链技术的在线购物中心。 Lunox将提供日常生活中所需的所有物品，卖家和买家之间的所有交易都将使用包括lunox令牌在内的数字货币，我们的系统还将提供钱包以分别将数字货币兑换成Lunox令牌。 每个成员都可以以其他数字货币的形式存款或取款，如BTC，ETH，XRP和LTC。 该业务旨在向公众介绍区块链支付系统，使他们更容易开展业务。 此外，Lunox将展示Lunox Exchange（LeX）数字货币兑换市场，并使Lunox Token成为市场数字资产，当然这将使Lunox在市场上成长并稳定下来。
